title: Queue timer for dodging.
body: Fuck you. Your client doesn't come back up when it's my ban/pick and im getting punished for browsing facebook while waiting because of this fucking bullshit.

replies.body:
Apart the FU I agree on this :( 
Happened to me yesterday.
I'm sure if this is a widespread problem (and not just 2 noobs) the team will fix it :)

> [{quoted}](name=MasterMirkinen,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=3EdGpKhW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-15T22:06:01.541+0000)
>
> Apart the FU I agree on this :( 
> Happened to me yesterday.
> I'm sure if this is a widespread problem (and not just 2 noobs) the team will fix it :)

You do not understand how many promo games have been lost due to this. thanks for understanding though. Appreciate someone from riot replying lol
